directions: Toss baby red potatoes with olive oil and kosher salt on large rimmed baking sheet. Place rosemary sprigs alongside the potatoes. Roast until the potatoes are tender and beginning to brown in spots, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pound unpeeled baby red potatoes (1- to 1 1/2-inch-diameter)
title: Roasted Baby Red Potatoes with Rosemary
